Open data file and read header.

All data is passed back through the arguments.

Parameters:
pMeshID Pointer to mesh ID
pDataID Pointer to data ID
pNumTimeSteps Pointer to number of time steps
pTimeStep Pointer to time step
pNumNodes Pointer to number of nodes
pNumNodeVals Pointer to number of values per node
pNumSets Pointer to number of element sets
ppSetSizes Pointer to array of number of elements in each set
pNumElemVals Pointer to number of values per element
